title: Raiders to hire Seahawks offensive coordinator Klint Kubiak as head coach

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: Sources: Kubiak to try to reach deal with Raiders
sources.description: The Raiders are expected to hire Seahawks offensive coordinator Klint Kubiak as their next head coach after the Super Bowl, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Raiders to hire Seahawks offensive coordinator Klint Kubiak as head coach
sources.description: The Las Vegas Raiders are eyeing Seattle OC Klint Kubiak as their next head coach, a deal that could become official after Super Bowl 60.
